shortDescription: Full-Featured Mobile Browser App created using Flutter and flutter_inappwebview.

longDescription: Retro Browser is here! The best experience for navigating the World Wide Web is now available. Combining a '90s style browser inspired by the olds Netscape Navigator and Internet Explorer with the power of the modern web pages. Retro Browser includes beautiful designs and animations that will simulate an early internet experience which main purpose is to make you travel in time.

shortDescription: Torn PDA has been developed as an assistant for players of Torn City (www.torn.com).
longDescription:
Torn PDA has been developed as an assistant for players of Torn City (www.torn.com).

It was conceived to enhance the experience of playing Torn from a mobile platform, and other already existing applications, such as YATA, have been a great influence.

* Profile page with shortcuts to you preferred sections, access to basic status data, recent events, cooldowns and net-worth calculation. You can also manually activate notifications so that you don't waste any energy, nerve, or miss any cooldown expiry.

* Check your travel status and configure notifications or alarms just before you arrive. No more forgetting and being mugged abroad. Also, configure the notification shown so that it is safe to use even at work or in other public environments.

* Have a look at foreign stocks directly in the Travel section. Filter and sort items at your convenience, including profit based on item capacity. Also, by using the in-app browser, you are contributing by sending stock data automatically to the shared database!

* YATA mobile interface: new sections (e.g. Awards) that constitute the first official YATA mobile interface. Data comes straight from your YATA account.

* Ability to fill max items on arrival to destination, based on current capacity and money available. Then, use the quick home return button in the top bar to make your stay quicker and safer.

* Quick crimes option when you visit the crimes section. Just set up your preferred crimes and they'll appear in the top bar.

* Quick Items: browse to the items section in Torn with the full browser and add your prefer items for a quick access later on.

* Trade calculator with total price calculation for cash, items and shares, plus the ability to copy total figures for a quick trading. If you are a professional trader, you can also synchronize with Torn Trader.

* Automatic city items finder in the map.

* Automatic alerts for travel, energy, nerve, hospitalization, drugs, racing, messages, events and trades.

* Torn chat: options to highlight your name or hide the chat completely if you wish.

* Follow your faction's chain live from the app, with instant energy updates. Use the chain watcher feature to avoid surprises.

* Create your own target list, adding your own comments and many other details. Import and export your targets to/from YATA. While chaining, automatically skip targets that can't be attacked (hospitalised/jailed or in a different country). Get optimal targets directly from Torn Attack Central, included in the Chaining section. Chaining has never been easier.

* Have a look at your last few attacks, with simple statistics so that you can decide when/who to add to your common chaining targets.

* Export targets as a backup or share them with other players.

* When in hospital, send Nuclear Central Hospital a revive request by clicking a button.

* Create a friends list, with quick access to in-game messaging, trading and other important details. Also, add note to your friends' profiles. Backup functionality included.

* Activate alerts for NPC loot.

* Dark mode.
usedFor: To display and assist players of Torn City (www.torn.com) website.

shortDescription: KryptoGO - Cryptocurrency Wallet for Bitcoin and NFTs
longDescription:
KryptoGO - Cryptocurrency Wallet for Bitcoin and NFTs

Easily and safely manage crypto, ETH, and BTC.

- The most beginner-friendly crypto wallet. Registration requires only your phone number and is lightning fast.
- Knowing your seed phrase is optional. Even without knowing your seed phrase, KryptoGO guarantees security and privacy.
- Passed the ISO 27701 and 27001 (information security and data privacy) certifications.
- Identity verification. Trade with phone contacts, or set up peer-to-peer (P2P) exchanges.
- Manage your assets from multiple chains. Your portfolio consolidates cryptocurrency tokens, NFTs, DeFi positions, and GameFi assets.
- Receive NFT airdrops straight to your wallet associated with your phone. Your KryptoGO identity serves as your Web3 passport
- Built-in DApp browser. Hand selected Defi investments tailored to you. Invest with a single click, and keep track of your return of investment.
- Scan QR codes and receive NFTs. See NFT price graphs and trends.
- List on OpenSea with a single click.

KryptoGO helps you explore the wonderful world of crypto, and is the most secure and beginner-friendly wallet for NFTs, Bitcoin, and Ethereum.

KryptoGO Wallet combines functionality of multiple services and wallets and simplifies procedure, making it super easy to perform a multitude of tasks.

With KryptoGO, start your journey into the metaverse.

KryptoGO Wallet is a decentralized, non-custodial wallet. That means users have 100% full control over their assets. KryptoGO or any other third party are unable to access user assets,.

KryptoGO started out in the field of regulatory finance, providing due-diligence (KYC) services and solutions to financial institutions worldwide. Now, we are working on establishing safe financial spaces in Web 3, starting with our secure, transparent, and decentralised asset management systems.

- The first blockchain company in Taiwan to pass ISO 27001 / 27701 information security and data privacy certifications.
- Multi-chain wallet. We support Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, Polygon, BNB Chian, Arbitrum, KCC, Tron
usedFor: Create an In-App browser to interact with blockchain

shortDescription: Aspirant APP is developed for the aspirant of the library, it is free to use app to help the library aspirant in their study as well as to automate the attendace process in Self Study Library across India.
longDescription:
The Library Aspirant App is an integral component of our comprehensive Library Management System, specifically designed to cater to the needs of library patrons. Exclusively crafted for aspirants of the library, this mobile application offers a suite of features tailored to enhance their experience and streamline their interaction with library services.

Here's a detailed description of the app's functionalities:

1. QR-Based Attendance: Simplify the attendance process with QR code scanning, allowing aspirants to check in swiftly upon arrival at the library premises.

2. Fee Notifications: Stay informed about pending payments and overdue fees through instant notifications, ensuring seamless financial transactions within the library ecosystem.

3. Time-Up Alerts: Receive timely alerts prior to the expiration of your library session, enabling effective time management and maximizing productivity during your visit.

4. Create Your Dream Quiz: Empower aspirants to create customized quizzes tailored to their interests, academic pursuits, or specific subjects, fostering a collaborative learning environment within the library community.

5. Give Dream Quiz: Facilitate knowledge sharing and engagement among library patrons by enabling them to share their created quizzes with fellow aspirants.

6. Doubt Discussion Panel: Engage in meaningful discussions, seek clarification, and resolve doubts in an interactive panel, fostering a collaborative and supportive learning environment.

7. In-App Web-View of Useful Websites: Enhance learning and stay up-to-date with a web view of informative and educational websites like ChatGPT, ensuring aspirants have access to valuable resources and opportunities.

8. Digital Writing Pad: Draw or write notes using the paint feature, allowing for a creative and versatile way to record information or brainstorm ideas.

9. Library Smart Card: The smart card contains your information and library details for library purposes only. The QR data is encrypted using the AES algorithm, ensuring that your data is secure and inaccessible to unauthorized parties.

10. Feedback: Provide feedback directly to your library. This feature ensures that your feedback is only accessible to the library manager, keeping your engagement with the library private and secure.

11. Guidance: Career guidance provides an overview of opportunity available after K-12.

The Library Aspirant App serves as a dedicated platform for library enthusiasts, providing them with the tools and resources necessary to optimize their library experience and make the most out of their academic endeavours. With its user-friendly interface and robust features, the app aims to empower aspirants and foster a culture of learning and exploration within the library ecosystem.
usedFor: The InAppWebView plugin is highly beneficial for us. In the Aspirant App, we utilize it to display various useful websites that our library aspirants frequently visit.
